article_node.title: Teen arrested after 'young child' found in water
article_node.summary: A teenage boy has been arrested after a young child was found in water at Boultham Park in Lincoln. The child suffered minor injuries and was taken to the hospital for further checks. Police are investigating the circumstances surrounding the incident and are seeking information from anyone who was in the park at the time.
